name: Gibzor's Pong
description:
A pong-like game with thrust based movement and a recharging boost. I made this to learn Godot and to have a creative outlet. It's the first game among others I aim to complete as part of a game-a-week hobby effort.

There's no in-game story at the moment, but if you like a simple story like I do, here is one: you were on a swashbuckling space expedition when your crew was flanked by the alien Gibzor.  He has you trapped and, apparently for his own amusement, is having you compete in a game he calls ញᔱ፨ጃ࿄ or "Gibzor's Pong".  Defeat Gibzor.

Features:

  • Thrust based movement
  • Controller support
  • Avatar selection
  • Singleplayer
  • Local multiplayer

A game of Gibzor's Pong is over after either side scores 5 points.

Controls:

Xbox ControllerKeyboard Player 1Keyboard Player 2Menu Navigationd-padarrow keys, enter key; mousearrow keys, enter key; mousePaddle Movementanalog stickw and s keyso and l keysBoosta buttonz key, keyBrakeb buttonx key. key

Recommended browser: Chrome
